title: Restriction of reaction sites on metal-sulfide cores induced by steric repulsion of bis-N-heterocyclic carbene ligands in trinuclear complexes bearing triply bridging sulfide ligands
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,29355-29367
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01671H, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Natsuki Yabune, Hiroshi Nakajima, Takanori Nishioka
Reactions of Ag+ and mixed-ligand and mixed-metal trinuclear complexes with bisNHC ligands show the formation of Ag–Pt or Ag–S bonds depending on the steric bulk of the bisNHC ligands attributed to the lengths of their bridging alkylene units.
